## JsonEditor.mergeObjectInPlace() method

Merges a supplied source object into a supplied target, updating the target object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mergeObjectInPlace(target: JsonObject, src: JsonObject, runtimeContext?: IJsonContext): Result<JsonObject>;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

target


</td><td>

JsonObject


</td><td>

The target `JsonObject` to be updated


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

src


</td><td>

JsonObject


</td><td>

The source `JsonObject` to be merged


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

runtimeContext


</td><td>

[IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) supplying variables and references.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;JsonObject&gt;

`Success` with the original source `JsonObject` if merge was successful. Returns `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
